page.title: 07Social Life in Beckermet
page.content: There are two Public Houses, The White Mare and The Royal Oak, as well as three Hotels, Yourity, Blackbeck and Sella Park, in our area. Public Houses are the busiest at lunch times and Saturday evenings, while the Hotels are busiest in the Summer months. Two of the Hotels serve restaurant meals while the Public Houses serve bar meals. Tourists and business men are the main customers of the Hotels. The Public Houses are mostly frequented by the local inhabitants. There is a Social Club at Braystones which provides facilities for the residents and visitors of the Caravan Site. Young people meet in each others' homes to listen to Â£Pop' music. Their favourite group is Wham closely followed by Duran Duran and Boy George.
